Artificial Intelligence

“Is artificial intelligence less than our intelligence?” —Spike Jonze 1

Artificial Intelligence Background
Branch Pioneer Country

flowchart LR
  A[Hard edge] --> B(Round edge)
  B --> C{Decision}
  C --> D[Result one]
  C --> E[Result two]

A Mermaid diagram

Natural Language Processing

  • Can be used to simplify jargon in text

  • Can be used to analyze sentiments behind text

  • Can be used to conclude main ideas through keywords

Popular Formulas Implemented:

+ Bayes' Theorem: $P(A|B) = \frac{P(B|A) * P(A)} {P(B)}$
+ Linear Regression: $Y = a + bX + ε$
+ Cosine Similarity: $\frac{a . b} {||a|| . ||b||}$

\[P(liking apples|love pears) = \frac{P(pears|liking apples) * P(liking apples)} {P(loving pears)}\]

Sentiment Analysis vs. Emotion Analysis

Sentiment Analysis

  • Can separate text as positive and negative experiences
  • In turn is useful for examining consensus

Emotion Analysis

  • Incorporates the range of human emotion
  • Yields more detailed information on consumer preference and experience
  • Sentiment Analysis
  • Emotional Analysis
